unnormalised: OMG, mhojea cousinachem logn plan korop ek full-time kam' zata mhaka! Baraat bara tareekh baaravea mhoineaant don hojaar chovis (12/12/2024) raatchea saat horan ani tees minutaan (7:30 PM) barobor pavojea poddtalim, punn Bharoteachea standard time prokaran disona, mhunn hum don horanchem extra time dovortam. Panditjik pherem falea sokallchea char horanchea adim (4:00 AM) zaunk zai, mhunn soglleanim chai ani Red Bull ghevn dovrat! Ani sangeetachi toiaaree teen satvodde adim suru korunk sangta te vixean mat uloinas mhaka – Mhaka soglem logn zalea uprant sutti zai poddteli!
normalised: Bhagwan mhajea, mhojea bhavachea lognachim ioznneo korun tem purnn vellachem kam' zalam! Baaraat sat tis P-M-ak bara disembr don hozar ani chovisacher tthik pavunk zai, punn Bhartiya Pramann Vella mhaiti astana, hanv "flexible" don voranchi buffer zaddtta. Panditjink feryo dusrea disa char A-M poilim korun zai, dekhun soglleanchean chai ani Red Bull-achi stock korun zai! Ani "sangeetachi toyari teen sat'to poilim suru zata" vishayant mhoje lagim uloinam- mhaka hea lognanchea uprant sutti zai!
text: OMG, mhojea cousinachem logn plan korop ek full-time kam' zata mhaka! Baraat bara tareekh baaravea mhoineaant don hojaar chovis (12/12/2024) raatchea saat horan ani tees minutaan (7:30 PM) barobor pavojea poddtalim, punn Bharoteachea standard time prokaran disona, mhunn hum don horanchem extra time dovortam. Panditjik pherem falea sokallchea char horanchea adim (4:00 AM) zaunk zai, mhunn soglleanim chai ani Red Bull ghevn dovrat! Ani sangeetachi toiaaree teen satvodde adim suru korunk sangta te vixean mat uloinas mhaka – Mhaka soglem logn zalea uprant sutti zai poddteli!
